text: The Civic Tower, also called Civic Center Towers, Civic Towers, is a 16-floor office building in Lagos. It is near the Civic Centre on Ozumba Mbadiwe Avenue, Victoria Island, Lagos. It was opened in 2015. On 20, July 2018, the Civic Towers and Civic Centre buildings were lit up in red to mark the 50th anniversary of Special Olympics alongside 225 landmarks across the world. == References == Category:Towers Category:Lagos Category:Buildings and structures in Nigeria Category:2015 establishments in Africa Category:2010s establishments in Nigeria
title: Civic Tower (Lagos)
